oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martínez Esteban, Isabel
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The main purpose of this dissertation is to encompass and critically reflect on the knowledge and skills acquired throughout the Master's Degree regarding learners’ motivation. The aim is to determine whether this Master’s has provided students with the necessary knowledge and abilities to motivate Secondary Education ESL students in the future.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Universidad de Zaragoza; Departamento de Filología Inglesa y Alemana; Área de Filología Inglesa
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Máster Universitario en Profesorado de Educación Secundaria Obligatoria, Bachillerato, Formación Profesional y Enseñanza de Idiomas, Artísticas y Deportivas
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Motivation strategies in the teaching-learning process in EFL Secondary Education
